Fraction of children who grew up in this area who in 2015 still live in the same census tract
Notes: Do we think it's good or bad for a high percentage of people to stay in the same census tract as adults? I think I had good originally, indicating a strong sense of community. However, a higher percentage could also mean that economic mobility is really poor and they are unable to leave to seek better opportunities for financial reasons. Removed since no clear directionality
